Key Match Events: Youri Tielemans struck inside two minutes to give Belgium an early lead.
Kevin De Bruyne doubled Belgium's lead with 10 minutes left, scoring from seven metres out after a long ball from goalkeeper Koen Casteels.
Romelu Lukaku provided an assist for Youri Tielemans' goal.
Kevin De Bruyne was named Player of the Match by UEFA's Technical Observer Panel.
Post-Match Reflections: Kevin De Bruyne was praised for making the difference for Belgium as they claimed their first points in Euro 2024.
The result leaves all four teams in Group E on three points, setting up a nail-biting end to the group stages.
